title: PGPD investigates death following struggle on College Avenue
author: Jeff Barnes

image.alt: Prince George’s County Police are investigating the death of a man following a physical struggle early Sunday morning on College Avenue.

blurb:
Prince George’s County Police are investigating the death of a man following a physical struggle early Sunday morning on College Avenue.

At about 1:55 a.m., police responded to the 5100 block of College Avenue for a towing dispute, the department wrote on Twitter. Upon arrival, police found two men involved in a physical struggle and separated the men, the posts read.

One of the men was unresponsive and taken to a local hospital where he was pronounced dead. The other man was taken in for questioning, according to the department’s Twitter feed.

When reached for comment Sunday morning, a PGPD spokesperson said the department could not provide any additional information.

_This story will be updated._
